scripts.pods:new: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: DESTINATION='node_modules/react-native-shimmer' LIB_FILE=`cd .. && echo \`pwd\`/\`npm pack\`` && (rm -rf $DESTINATION || true) && mkdir $DESTINATION && tar -xvzf $LIB_FILE -C $DESTINATION --strip-components 1 && rm $LIB_FILE
